name: RobotScout
0:
”Alexa, show my robot scout”
”Alexa, ask robot scout to turn left.”
”Alexa, ask robot scout to patrol”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robot scout
Developer Terms of Use
des: There are two main features in this Robot Scout skill for Amazon Alexa, video streaming and voice control. Speaking to Echo screen devices such as Echo Show, Scout can stream the video image to Echo Show. Users can also use voice commands to control the robot's movement, such as start patrol, move forward by 10 inches, rotate by 90 degrees, etc. The Alexa Skill Kit of Robot Scout requires the purchase of the Moorebot Scout device and the installation of the device into an Amazon Alexa account. You can download our "Robot Scout" app in Google Play or iOS App Store. It will guide you through the process.
